creator: Outerminds Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Journey to Pixeland, home of the cute and epic Pixelings.

Trouble brews; a mysterious being is consuming Pixeland’s inhabitants. It’s up to you and PewDiePie to battle against the threatening invaders and restore order to Pixeland’s different worlds!

Build your deck of Pixelings and lead them to glorious victory! Collect and upgrade over 30 hand drawn pixel creatures in this EPIC Idle but not-so IDLE RPG Game. Make new friends and catch up with familiar faces from Tuber Simulator & Legend of the Brofist.

Go head-to-head against other players in gripping, real-time PvP battles. Devise the best strategy, use big brain tactics, and make your name famous in the arena!

Drag, drop, and swap! PewDiePie’s Pixelings has the best combat system: it captures the essence of idle games and the strategic depth of turn-based strategy RPGs.

Create a guild and chat with your friends to build a new unique strategy!

TL;DR:
• Collect & upgrade new and epic Pixelings
• Join PewDiePie on a “meme-orable” quest across Pixeland, home of the Pixelings
• Play against other players in real-time PvP matches
• Battle using a unique, fluid combat system that captures elements of idle and strategy games
• Meme to glory in an all-new storyline set in PewDiePie’s Pixelverse (Tuber Simulator,
Legend of the Brofist)
• Join guilds and chat with your friends!
• Collect & master ALL the spells and experiment with different monster teams
descriptionShort: Epic monsters from the Tuber Simulator Universe. Collect, Battle, Meme Review.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Onwards to Crushopolis, a mysterious, mechanical world!
* Collect 8 new Pixelings
* Collect 3 new spells
* Minor bug fixes and improvements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-The “Cure” spell should no longer remove negative effects on “Spell-immune” Pixelings
-Fixed a bug that would cause undeployed Pixelings to be affected by negative status effects
-Fixed a bug that would cause the game to soft lock at the end of a PvP match
-Fixed an exploit that would allow players to easily obtain 3 Stars on PvE missions
-Fixed various VFX bugs related to spells and Pixeling abilities
-Player icons should display properly in the Guild Chest Contributions list

title: PewDiePie's Pixelings - Idle RPG Collection Game

creator: Outerminds Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Journey to Pixeland, home of the cute and epic Pixelings.

Trouble brews; a mysterious being is consuming Pixeland’s inhabitants. It’s up to you and PewDiePie to battle against the threatening invaders and restore order to Pixeland’s different worlds!

Build your deck of Pixelings and lead them to glorious victory! Collect and upgrade over 30 hand drawn pixel creatures in this EPIC Idle but not-so IDLE RPG Game. Make new friends and catch up with familiar faces from Tuber Simulator & Legend of the Brofist.

Go head-to-head against other players in gripping, real-time PvP battles. Devise the best strategy, use big brain tactics, and make your name famous in the arena!

Drag, drop, and swap! PewDiePie’s Pixelings has the best combat system: it captures the essence of idle games and the strategic depth of turn-based strategy RPGs.

Create a guild and chat with your friends to build a new unique strategy!

TL;DR:
• Collect & upgrade new and epic Pixelings
• Join PewDiePie on a “meme-orable” quest across Pixeland, home of the Pixelings
• Play against other players in real-time PvP matches
• Battle using a unique, fluid combat system that captures elements of idle and strategy games
• Meme to glory in an all-new storyline set in PewDiePie’s Pixelverse (Tuber Simulator,
Legend of the Brofist)
• Join guilds and chat with your friends!
• Collect & master ALL the spells and experiment with different monster teams

title: PewDiePie's Pixelings

creator: Outerminds Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Journey to Pixeland, home of the cute and epic Pixelings. Become the best in this collectible card game (CCG) with a customizable deck of hero cards, upgradable skills and spells, idle RPG with turn-based combat. Beat the single-player PvE campaign filled with fantasy, magic, memes and funny stuff, and join in on competitive PvP battles with rankings, leaderboards, guilds, loot and rewards.

Trouble brews; a mysterious being is consuming Pixeland’s inhabitants. It’s up to you and PewDiePie to battle against the threatening invaders and restore order to Pixeland’s different worlds!

Master your deck-building skills by creating a team of heroes and lead them to glorious victory in our PvE campaign mode!

Unlock and collect over 30 hand-drawn pixel creatures, catch them all. Gather resources and manage them well to upgrade your creatures. Combine and unite heroes of different classes like fighter, rogue and mage to defeat your enemies with brute force, cunning and magic; the gathering of your team will define your strategy.

Experiment between different team ups, draft new champions into your roster, and adapt your team depending on the circumstances. Collect common, rare and mythic cards to gain the edge during battles. Practice your battle skills and level up your champions. Drag, drop, and swap! PewDiePie’s Pixelings has the best combat system: it captures the essence of idle games and the strategic depth of turn-based strategy RPGs. Meet new friends and catch up with familiar faces from Tuber Simulator & Legend of the Brofist on your quest to defeat the ultimate evil in this EPIC Idle but not-so IDLE RPG Game.

Challenge other players in gripping, online multiplayer real time 5-on-5 PvP battles. Train in the arena and join ranked play seasons once you’re ready to go battle fierce opponents. Devise the best strategy, use big brain tactics, make the best moves and make your name famous in the arena by winning the most duels on the battlefield during tournaments. Use quick chat to communicate with your opponent during brawls. Win amazing prizes and become part of a league of legends!

Join or create a guild and contribute to your community chest to gain amazing loot and rewards for you and your clan. Chat with your friends to build a new unique strategy!

• Collect & upgrade epic Pixelings
• Join PewDiePie on a “meme-orable” quest across Pixeland, home of the Pixelings
• Play against other players in real-time PvP matches
• Battle using a unique, fluid combat system that captures elements of idle and strategy games
• Meme to glory in an all-new storyline set in PewDiePie’s Pixelverse (Tuber Simulator,
Legend of the Brofist)
• Join guilds, chat with your friends, contribute to the chest and gain amazing loot!
• Collect & master ALL the spells and experiment with different monster teams
descriptionShort: Strategy RPG, Collect Heroes, Join Clans, Fight Online Multiplayer PvP Battles

title:
PewDiePie's Pixelings PvP RPG
1.61.1

creator: Outerminds Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Journey to Pixeland, home of the cute and epic Pixelings. Become the best in this collectible card game (CCG) with a customizable deck of hero cards, upgradable skills and spells, idle RPG with turn-based combat. Beat the single-player PvE campaign filled with fantasy, magic, memes and funny stuff, and join in on competitive PvP battles with rankings, leaderboards, guilds, loot and rewards.

Trouble brews; a mysterious being is consuming Pixeland’s inhabitants. It’s up to you and PewDiePie to battle against the threatening invaders and restore order to Pixeland’s different worlds!

Master your deck-building skills by creating a team of heroes and lead them to glorious victory in our PvE campaign mode!

Unlock and collect over 30 hand-drawn pixel creatures, catch them all. Gather resources and manage them well to upgrade your creatures. Combine and unite heroes of different classes like fighter, rogue and mage to defeat your enemies with brute force, cunning and magic; the gathering of your team will define your strategy.

Experiment between different team ups, draft new champions into your roster, and adapt your team depending on the circumstances. Collect common, rare and mythic cards to gain the edge during battles. Practice your battle skills and level up your champions. Drag, drop, and swap! PewDiePie’s Pixelings has the best combat system: it captures the essence of idle games and the strategic depth of turn-based strategy RPGs. Meet new friends and catch up with familiar faces from Tuber Simulator & Legend of the Brofist on your quest to defeat the ultimate evil in this EPIC Idle but not-so IDLE RPG Game.

Challenge other players in gripping, online multiplayer real time 5-on-5 PvP battles. Train in the arena and join ranked play seasons once you’re ready to go battle fierce opponents. Devise the best strategy, use big brain tactics, make the best moves and make your name famous in the arena by winning the most duels on the battlefield during tournaments. Use quick chat to communicate with your opponent during brawls. Win amazing prizes and become part of a league of legends!

Join or create a guild and contribute to your community chest to gain amazing loot and rewards for you and your clan. Chat with your friends to build a new unique strategy!

• Collect & upgrade epic Pixelings
• Join PewDiePie on a “meme-orable” quest across Pixeland, home of the Pixelings
• Play against other players in real-time PvP matches
• Battle using a unique, fluid combat system that captures elements of idle and strategy games
• Meme to glory in an all-new storyline set in PewDiePie’s Pixelverse (Tuber Simulator,
Legend of the Brofist)
• Join guilds, chat with your friends, contribute to the chest and gain amazing loot!
• Collect & master ALL the spells and experiment with different monster teams
